html:
Common Abbreviations

This book uses a number of abbreviations to keep the rules compact (well, less voluminous).
Abbreviation Meaning
Attributes
STR Strength
INT Intellect
WIL Will
DEX Dexterity
CON Constitution
CHA Charisma
Other
hp Hit points
shp Structural hit points
HD Hit Dice (or Hit Die)
AC Armor Class
XP Experience points
PC Player character
NPC Non-player character
cp Copper pieces
sp Silver pieces
ep Electrum pieces
gp Gold pieces
pp Platinum pieces
TT Treasure Type

rawMarkdown:
## Common Abbreviations

This book uses a number of abbreviations to keep the rules compact (well, less voluminous).

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| **Abbreviation** | **Meaning** |
| **Attributes** |  |
| STR | Strength |
| INT | Intellect |
| WIL | Will |
| DEX | Dexterity |
| CON | Constitution |
| CHA | Charisma |
| **Other** |  |
| hp | Hit points |
| shp | Structural hit points |
| HD | Hit Dice (or Hit Die) |
| AC | Armor Class |
| XP | Experience points |
| PC | Player character |
| NPC | Non-player character |
| cp | Copper pieces |
| sp | Silver pieces |
| ep | Electrum pieces |
| gp | Gold pieces |
| pp | Platinum pieces |
| TT | Treasure Type |
